@@ -91,0 +91,3 @@
+            // Start each loop with a clear log buffer so we only
+            // track the run that can potentially fail:
+            log.clearLogBuffer();

@@ -480,0 +480,7 @@
+    /**
+     * Clear all messages from log buffer.
+     */
+    public synchronized void clearLogBuffer() {
+        logBuffer.clear();
+    }
+
